keys.mattheson: rude, bold, and tender
leering, aggrieved, rapturous, grimacing, unusual
sharp, headstrong, for warlike and merry things
pathetic, serious, sad, hostile to all sensuality
despairing, fatally sad, hopeless as of extreme love
evocative of beautiful sentiments: generosity, constancy, love
triumphant and relieved, as in glory over struggle
suggestive and rhetorical, for serious as well as happy times
key of the grave: full of death, putrefaction, judgment, eternity
affecting and brilliant, inclined to complaining, sad passions
diverting, magnificent, but also dainty and clear of conscience
offensive, harsh, unpleasant, gaudy and desperate in character
sweet, sad, and lovesick
penitential lament, disappointment with the world, confession to God
devout, tranquil, grand, melancholic, flowing as brooding humors
anxious, of brooding despair, of black depression, of a gloomy mind
naive, innocent, and hopeful
tender, calm, profound, weighty, of a fatal mental anxiety
languishing, amorous, unrestrained, and strange
graceful, agreeable, tender, yearning, diverting, of tempered joyfulness
grumbling, suffocative, grappling, wailing in lament
plaintive, decorous, resigned, inviting sleep
quaint, surly, and mocking
bizarre, morose, and melancholic
